message:
Hello geeks :) !
I am a noob front end developer  .
I hv created some Android apps ... shared them on Google Play and on my fb, but really I don't know where else to share them to get more downloads  !!
I don't want to spam for downloads O:) so  ..
can u tell me ur tricks sharing ur apps plz ^_^ !?

*****************************************************************************
one of my apps calculates and tells u where to sit @ bus to avoid direct sun :D
another tells u the best study time 
another feeds u the last science news
another is seb7a 
another one for learning Arabic chars 
and the last one for MultiTouch test 

finally i finished the post !  w8ing ur help ‚ù§

data.message:
Try sharing your apps on XDA-Developers forum.
forum.xda-developers.com
